<MethodEndpoint

Fetches the individual information of the logged in user to populate the Profile page.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Returns user profile","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"first_name":{"type":"string","example":"Jane"},"last_name":{"type":"string","example":"Doe"},"email":{"type":"string","example":"jdoe@mail.org"},"roles":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"organization_name":{"type":"string"}},"example":{"first_name":"Jane","last_name":"Doe","email":"jdoe@mail.org","roles":["developer"],"organization_name":"Stellar Aid"},"title":"Profile"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
